content: Unpacking files failed, can't even open the game
Not working anymore. No devs support either, it seems. Sad: it was a great port. :(
Release on Nintendo Switch, Please!
Doesn't work on Android 11.
Can't open on Android 11, get error "unpacking files failed". Hopefully, developers update and fix issue, otherwise, can't recommend game.
üëç
it needs better control pad . The pad moves to much . Its hard to control . Bigger control pad . Thank you.
The best action RPG on Android for sure! If you using Bluetooth gamepad this game just simply fantastic. Ty dotEMU great port.
This is an amazing series.
Love it
Wicked Awesome
Better than Ys1
This remaster is easier to control than the original, and the music sounds just as amazing as ever! It's a decent upgrade from the turbographx 16.

Really dislike the combat system in this game, it is literally just running into enemies repeatedly. Gets REALLY boring and repetitive extremely quickly. Not to mention that constantly running full speed makes controlling exactly where you are going difficult & tedious. Every single area is just like a pointless massive labyrinth with no clue which direction to go while you run into everything over & over. Feel kind of decieved by the description & regret purchasing.
Awesome game!
This is the best action adventure game for Android.
perfect rendition of an awesome game
lousy controls. pls do not buy this game. instant regret purchasing this
One of the best JRPGs of all time!
this app game doesnt work. im a huge fan of the series and highly disappointed. very dissapointed.
Literally the worst combat system of all time...running into an enemy to deal damage is really stupid. I actually feel like i was ripped off by purchasing this game.
Love it
2 Games with the same awesome, addicting gameplay? Sign me up!
It was a really well done port of a fantastic game. I'm just saying that, if y'all ported III (or Oath in Felghana), I would pay good money for it.
Excellent zelda like rpg brilliant
Virtual D-pad control sucks! Learn from KEMCO on how to fix the virtual d-pad control fixed location.
Its allright. Different than most action rpgs.
Requires too many permissions. If you don't allow them, the game never loads.
How about porting Ys Origins? I bet that would be a blast.
The second part to my all time favorite game.

As an old fan of the series this is one of the coolest things - EVER. And 
its free. What more do I need to say? There's a reason this is one of the 
most enduring classics. Thank you so much for this little gem.
Amazing game

I recently discovered the Ys saga, so glad I did! I really hope to see more 
Ys games on Android. Thank you!

Where do I find the fire spell? I have the staff but no Mana please 
hellllppp
The controls are terrible
Georgeous!
Good RPG game but gets reeeealy grind to get leveled up
Classic bump combat and amazing story

I very much like this game, however when I got to level 22 in the game, the 
app stopped and the game no longer wants to proceed. When I hit the load or 
continue button, it brings me back to my phones' main screen. I have 
contacted DotEmu via email and they responded to me saying they will look 
into it, however I havn't heard from them since, and its been since the 
beginning of February.
So much fun
So awesome

The control made me stressed out so I didn't get the chance to focus and 
enjoy the game

This game was reasonably enjoyable until I got to Gelaldy. I'm playing on a 
Samsung 10 inch tablet without a controller of any kind and it's proving to 
be impossible to defeat him. I kept grinding and grinding hoping another 
level would make it easier, but here I am at level 31 and still not even 
coming close. The problem is not accurate enough controls to stop on a dime 
to turn and fire precisely when needed. After a handful of hours trying on 
top of many other hours grinding, I'm giving up. Besides, it's really just 
a rehash of the grindy single hero RPGs that litter the Play Store, so if I 
feel like playing that genre I'll just go find one that's better suited to 
using the native tablet controls.

Highly promising action rpg that is sadly let down by its touch screen 
controls. Nigh impossible to attack accurately in the primary cardinal 
directions.
Poor controls and I can't stand the bump mechanic. Nice graphics though.

*on Samsung Galaxy s6* lags in the beginning, really wanted to play this but not a fan of simple control for attacking and no action button but moving up as an interaction. Uninstalled  and didnt get a refund. As much as its on sale I really, really wanted to play this. :(
Ruined by the terrible controls. What is the point of porting a game to mode if the controls are so bad it becomes extremely difficult to play.
If grinding isn't solving your problem, the only solution left is to get better at it
An amazing port of an amazing remaster of one of the genesis of J- Action RPGs.  Ys > Zelda in many ways!! Underrated series
Anyone who has ever thought about playing this series should definitely start with these 2 entries.
My favorite game of all time!!

As a child i beat ys 3 on snes this was my 2nd ys game the boss battles are intense as well as difficult my tip to all of you you have alot of time to grind so please do that as much as possible. I beat it!!! You can tooüòå GO ADOL!!!
IMO better than the first part

Much more balanced than the first game. Not for the faint hearted or casual gamer expect to die alot and get frustrated. This does help towards the overall satisfaction of beating a rather hard boss. Think Dark souls but with a lot of luck thrown in on some boss fights. You have to grind in this game and this isn't a pay to win game either. If you purchase this game you get just that a real hardcore Jrpg and a good amount of hours game play. Definitely worth money. On another note the translation is a bit off but this is minor

LOVE the game. It's too bad I got STUCK at the Solomon Shrine and could not proceed further. A zavanite in Mesa's sector was supposed to give me a Pass but never did. Thus, I am left totally unsatisfied. Please help me or fix this bug >:(
Good game and I really enjoyed it, but the virtual pad is just plain horrible. Please fix it. I can't even run straight or go where I want to go when I am trying to beat mobs or bosses.
Keep doing ports guys!
Good game overall, excellent music, makes one remember better times in videogames...
Brilliant game! The port is excellent, well done!
Finally.. A beautiful port
I bought ys 1 but it shows I have to pay even though I never cancelled the order... was going to dl it from my purchased list üòì
Always a fun game please release the next ones ill gladly pay
Classic Ys gameplay.  And it controls well on my tablet too!
Definitely worth the money.  Hope to see the rest of the series come to mobile gaming.
I love Y's series, and this one is no exception!
I am a fan of ys so if there were more in mobile version i would buy them too
just finished the gameüòçüòçüòç waiting for the rest of the serise
A masterpiece
Great gameplay and loving the combat

A perfect port complete with spelling and grammatic inconsistencies. Great job, guys! I used to play the original on MSX2 back in the 80's and am quite surpirsed how well this game still holds up, especially the enhanced version. This game defined me as a technical artist. Would really love to see more Falcom titles as well as T&E and Konami. :-D
I really enjoy playing all of the ys games and wondering if you guys plan on making the rest is them for Android devices?????? I would love to purchase them!!!!
Needs attack button.  Super annoying to have attack and walk and run all be the same thing.

I'm at the point where the game begins. So far, I like it because it continues on where Ys I left off. I'm glad it made it into the Google Play Store! :D Now I hope that it'll bring back the classic Y's series from the NES/SNES games and hopefully ported to the Android system! Keep it up! :D
